errors.name: MultisigAccountNotAuthorized
errors.msg: Account is not authorized to sign this instruction

errors.name: MultisigAlreadySigned
errors.msg: Account has already signed this instruction

errors.name: MultisigAlreadyExecuted
errors.msg: This instruction has already been executed

errors.name: InvalidEnvironment
errors.msg: Instruction is not allowed in production

errors.name: InstructionNotAllowed
errors.msg: Instruction is not allowed at this time

errors.name: PermissionlessOracleMissingSignature
errors.msg: Permissionless oracle update must be preceded by Ed25519 signature verification instruction

errors.name: PermissionlessOracleMalformedEd25519Data
errors.msg: Ed25519 signature verification data does not match expected format

errors.name: PermissionlessOracleSignerMismatch
errors.msg: Ed25519 signature was not signed by the oracle authority

errors.name: PermissionlessOracleMessageMismatch
errors.msg: Signed message does not match instruction params

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: Owner of Token Account does not match

errors.name: InvalidAccess
errors.msg: Only nft holders or referred users can trade

errors.name: TradingAccountMismatch
errors.msg: Trading account doesnot match referral account
